content: this quick and easy moss stitch washcloth is one of the august contributions to the 2024 washcloth cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** approximately 40-160 yds of category 4 medium weight cotton yarn i used knit picks dishie yarn in the butterscotch colorway size i 5 5mm furls streamline metal blush crochet hook yarn needle for weaving ends scissors
